messages.subject: Pam Laricchia's podcasts
messages.msgSnippet: Look! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC24Frx1-PEOAKr_04JjznfQ/videos?sort=p&view=0&shelf_id=3 Pam Laricchia is uploading the podcasts onto YouTube.  That will
messages.messageBody:
Look!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC24Frx1-PEOAKr_04JjznfQ/videos?sort=p&view=0&shelf_id=3

Pam Laricchia is uploading the podcasts onto YouTube. That will make it easier or some to find them.

If you don’t subscribe to Pam Laricchia’s e-mails you really should. Her writing flows, and she tells stories of her own life and thoughts, and writes beautiful intros to the pocasts that I can’t find stored elsewhere. Some of them I snag, like this (I’m still formatting that page):
http://sandradodd.com/robyn/interview
Robyn Coburn

There are others who are or have been active in this discussion. This format might make it simpler to share particular interviews with friends and family or interested others!

Sandra
